product_overview: ClubCentral is a comprehensive full-stack web platform designed to streamline and centralize the management of college clubs and organizations. It empowers club leaders and members to efficiently handle member administration, event and task management, financial tracking, team coordination, social media scheduling, and more, including advanced Institution Mode for multi-club oversight and integrated AI assistance for productivity enhancements.
core_goals: Centralize club operations to improve collaboration and efficiency.
Provide robust role-based access control with granular permissions for secure management.
Simplify member onboarding through streamlined application and approval workflows.
Enable comprehensive event and task management with AI-powered task generation and suggestions.
Support financial transaction tracking with approval workflows and export capabilities.
Facilitate team and committee management within clubs.
Allow social media content scheduling and multi-platform management.
Offer multi-club management and analytics through Institution Mode for colleges and universities.
Incorporate AI-powered assistance for smarter event planning and task breakdown.
Deliver a modern, intuitive user interface with seamless navigation across dashboards and landing pages.
key_features: Member Management with role assignments and application approvals.
Role & Permission System including predefined and custom roles with fine-grained controls.
Event Management including creation, status tracking, budget planning, and AI task generation.
Task Management with assignment to members or teams, due dates, status tracking, and AI assistance.
Team Management with team creation, captain assignment, and task delegation.
Financial Management featuring transaction tracking, receipt uploads, approval workflows, and data export.
Social Media Management supporting creation, scheduling, multi-platform posting, and status tracking.
Committee Management including vice-president assignments and core member roles.
Institution Mode for multi-club management, analytics, department organization, and centralized reporting.
AI Features leveraging Groq and Google Gemini for task generation and smart event planning suggestions.
Settings & Configuration including club details, codes, and college information.
Dashboard with overview statistics, recent activity, quick actions, and data analytics.
Marketing Landing Page with animations, UI primitives, and clear CTAs to engage users.
user_flow_summary: User signup initiates a club creation and assigns the president role.
Prospective members apply via unique club codes and await approval by presidents or vice-presidents.
Approved members gain access to dashboards personalized by their roles and permissions.
Users create and manage events with budgets, assign tasks manually or with AI assistance.
Tasks are created, assigned to individuals or teams, and tracked through their lifecycle.
Financial transactions are recorded, receipts uploaded, and approvals routed to authorized personnel.
Social media posts are crafted, scheduled, and monitored across supported platforms.
Institution mode users manage multiple clubs, view analytics, create clubs, and assign presidents.
Admins configure roles, permissions, settings, and oversee committee membership.
All users experience a responsive UI with accessible navigation and interactive dashboard components.
validation_criteria: All role-based permissions correctly enforce access restrictions and UI gating.
Member application and approval workflows function reliably with notification feedback.
Event and task creation, assignment, editing, and deletion operate without errors.
AI task generation responds accurately using valid API keys and generates meaningful outputs.
Financial management workflows support transaction recording, approval, and export.
Social media management allows post creation, scheduling, status tracking, and updates.
Institution mode features allow multi-club creation, management, analytics retrieval, and reporting.
Authentication system secures JWT-based sessions with proper token validation and expiry handling.
Frontend UI responsiveness and accessibility meet modern standards across devices.
Backend API endpoints enforce authentication and authorization per specification and handle errors gracefully.

features.name: Express API & Server Bootstrap
features.description: Central Express entry point registers routes, injects Vite middleware during development, and serves the unified API plus client bundle on the configured port.

features.name: Shared Database Schema & Permissions
features.description: Drizzle ORM schema definitions and shared permission constants describe clubs, institutions, and role capabilities for both backend and frontend logic.

features.name: Authentication Context & Protected Routes
features.description: React context providers, hooks, and route guards manage JWT-based user sessions, exposing helpers for client components to gate access.

features.name: Dashboard & App Shell
features.description: High-level application shell configures navigation, sidebar layout, and page routing across dashboard areas with TanStack Query integration.

features.name: Marketing Landing Page
features.description: Feature-rich landing page implements animations, product highlights, and CTA sections using Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and reusable UI primitives.
